abstract: Joe Martens, head of the Department of Environmental Conservation, plans to answer questions on high-volume hydraulic fracturing on Saturday. Will there be softballs?
snippet: Joe Martens, head of the Department of Environmental Conservation, plans to answer questions on high-volume hydraulic fracturing on Saturday. Will there be softballs?
lead_paragraph: Now it's the New York State environmental commissioner's turn for a town hall-style online chat.
